body.description: Cute Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Wide Compatibility Works with your PC, Desktop, Laptop, Chromebook, Notebook, Computer. Compatible with Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 /10 , Linux operating systems. Solution For Keyboard/Mouse No Response * Solution For Keyboard Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the ESC+K keys of the keyboard; Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again. * Solution For Mouse Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the middle button and the right button of the mouse; Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cute Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Wide Compatibility Works with your PC, Desktop, Laptop, Chromebook, Notebook, Computer. Compatible with Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 /10 , Linux operating systems. Solution For Keyboard/Mouse No Response * Solution For Keyboard Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the ESC+K keys of the keyboard; Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again. * Solution For Mouse Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the middle button and the right button of the mouse; Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again. What You Can Get: * 1x Full-size Wireless Keyboard * 1x Wireless Mouse * 1x USB Receiver (Stored in the mouse) * 2*AA battery (included) * 1x User Manual

Plug and Play This white wireless keyboard and mouse kit is equipped with a nano receiver, only need a USB port, plug and play, no other drivers. Retro Keyboard Typewriter Style Vintage typewriter-inspired rounded keycaps, gives you the most comfortable typing experience and adds some much needed spunk to your desk. Automatic Sleep Mode To further conserve battery life, turn into power-save mode automatically.

Numeric Keypad & LED Indicator There are three indicator: Caps Lock Indicator, Num Lock Indicator and Power Indicator on the keyboard's right corner, which helps you easily catch the typing status. Silent & Cute Wireless Mouse Quieter click, don't worry about disturbing others, and make you concentrate on your work. Where to Find USB Receiver? Wireless keyboard requires 1*AA battery(include), wireless mouse requires 1*AA battery (Include). Tips: The receiver is placed in the back of the mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🌟THIS KEYBOARD IS FANTASTIC🌟 10/10 - Great Gift for WFH !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This review is for the Green Wireless Keyboard and Mouse, KOOTOP Cute Green Colorful Keyboard and Mouse, 2.4G Wireless Keyboard with Retro Round Keycap for PC, Mac, Laptop,Tablet,Computer Windows (Green)……….…… ……….…… ……….……To summarize this item in one word - FANTASTIC!The Look - The design is very welcoming & user friendly. In comparison to a common work keyboard (LOGI K360) it is a similar layout. The KOOTOP keyboard is about 2-inches longer that a common work keyboard & is about 1/2-inch thicker. The base of the keyboard has a smooth, glossy finish which is very easy to clean. The keys are a smooth matte finish & the key labels are stickers on the keys. The key shape is a nontraditional, typewriter kind of shape. If you don’t have long nails, these keys are nicely designed to fit your finger without being too close to each other. Certain keys do not have written indicators (tab, shift, delete, enter) however it is clearly translated what those keys are meant for. The mouse has a matte finish on the bottom & a smooth glossy finish on top. There are 4 buttons on the mouse: left click, right click, the scrolling wheel, & a side trigger (preferable for PC gaming). It is about the same size as a common work mouse & fits very comfortable in your hand.The Function - The KOOTOP keyboard works as well as a standard keyboard. The keys all have immediate responses & are very easy to press on. Despite the gaps between the keys, I do not struggle with hitting the right key/falling into the gaps. I wear acrylic nails, so while I see multiple people speaking to the quietness of the keyboard I unfortunately cannot relate. For us gel tipped superstars, the key tapping can be a little louder than those with shorter nails but it’s not that abrasive, high pitched, scratching sound you get from hitting a key on a Mac/LOGI keyboard. I’ve included a video for reference. The mouse is a low, pleasant click & is also very responsive in click & scroll. The mouse won’t work unless you click to wake it. Both operate on one double-A (AA) battery each & batteries are provided.The Feel - This might sound a little extra, but this keyboard genuinely makes me want to sit down & type. The color wave & the sound make this keyboard a very inviting tool - especially for work. The color options give a choice for every aesthetic & vibe (that being said, GIVE MORE COLOR OPTIONS!). I can’t think of anyone who wouldn’t benefit from the experience of this keyboard.Tldr; Buy it, love it, thank me later ✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it, so aesthetically pleasing and love the clicking. I get so many compliments at work. I use my own mouse because the one provided was just weird and I didn't like it but the keyboard is the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfortable Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: This is a very stylish and comfortable keyboard. It was very easy to connect to both PC and Mac computer. I have received multiple compliments on the keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great and colorful
reviews.reviewText: Overall it is a great keyboard. They keys are a bit further apart and it sits higher up than my previous keyboard. The mouse will turn off after a while and you need to turn it off then on again for it to work. It is a bit frustrating to have to turn it back on instead of moving the mouse like other wireless ones. If you are constantly using your mouse it should not be an issue for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Stylish Keyboard For Everyday Use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The set comes with the 104 keys typewriter keyboard, the mouse and two batteries. It's totally wireless and doesn't need to be charged. There are two AA batteries included where on has to be added to the keyboard and one to the mouse. There's no on or off button. The mouse and keyboard start automatically working when any button is pressed and go into sleep again after about 10 minutes. So the battery can last for up to 18 months. The keyboard is comfortable, has even a kick-stand to elevate it in the back and comes with 4 soft rubber feet and is pretty silent to type with and has even 13 multi media buttons for volume, e-mail and many more functions. The mouse has a dedicated back button, a soft and comfortable scroll wheel and works even on white and shiny surfaces. The 2.4g USB dongle which connects mouse and keyboard, is in the mouse which you can just add to any USB-A port of your computer and wait for the confirmation that it has been connected (full plug and play) and then you can start typing and using the mouse. Love it for the colors, the style and how comfortable it is to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Color Scheme
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the look I was going for, it matched beautifully with my surface pro laptop, the keyboard is very comfortable to type and it was easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how the keyboard isn’t loud, but isnt silent either. It has a nice feel to it and everything any other keyboard would do. my favorite part which is why I bought it is the forward and back on the mouse. Whether it’s school or work, it’s always so useful! I wanted to know how can I make the spacebar silent because it’s obnoxiously loud, it’s the only thing I don’t like.. haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not last.
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard and mouse are very cute. I have had them for several months now though and they already appear to be not working as well as when first purchased. The keyboard lags when typing and sometimes I have to hit a key multiple times before it starts typing. The mouse is not as smooth as I would like and sometimes is difficult to move or lags as well. I have replaced the batteries several times as well thinking it would help but it doesn’t.
